definition: the sage presents as an ordinary person (idiom)

sentences.english: The life-model for the painting of the figure of Jesus was hosen first.
sentences.chinese: 基督画像的真人模特是第一位被遴选。

sentences.english: According to Xie Wanglin's best-selling novel, based on the reality.
sentences.chinese: 根据谢旺霖同名畅销小说改编，真人真事为蓝本。

sentences.english: What am I going to do with a life-size portrait of a bishop?
sentences.chinese: 我要如何处理一副主教的真人大小的肖像呢？

sentences.english: The third part of "The Cartoon of Kids of Family" is almost the same as the real-life version.
sentences.chinese: 《家有儿女动画版》第三部剧情基本跟真人版一致。

sentences.english: Her dark, human like hair, hung in loose curls around her almost angelic face.
sentences.chinese: 她乌黑的如同真人般的卷发垂在天使般的面庞边。

sentences.english: The "reality TV" is a new kind entertainment on telescreen .
sentences.chinese: 真人秀是近年来在电视屏幕上兴起的新的娱乐形式。

sentences.english: The computerized talking dictionary, unparalleled in the world, is. a good assis. ant for your successful career.
sentences.chinese: 真人发声电脑辞典，独步天下，事业成功好帮手。

sentences.english: Go ahead and buy that hideous, life-size statue of Wayne Newton.
sentences.chinese: 想买那个看上去丑丑的，真人大小的牛顿塑像吗？

sentences.english: Us two things on both sides of a life-size statue of lucky boy.
sentences.chinese: 我们面前东西两侧设有两尊真人大小的招财童子立像。

sentences.english: It looks like reality TV shows are here to stay.
sentences.chinese: 看来真人真事的电视节目已成为风潮。

sentences.english: Canadian Transformers Live Action Movie Fans are in for a treat.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大变形金刚真人电影迷都在为一种享受。

sentences.english: They are actually life-size and they're really good. And yeah,
sentences.chinese: 它们与真人一样大小，真的很不错。而且是的，

sentences.english: One of the best showcases for narcissists at the moment is reality TV.
sentences.chinese: 目前最适合自恋者表现的场合之一是电视真人秀。

sentences.english: A robot so realistic looking that she- or rather it- can be a little unsettling.
sentences.chinese: 机器人看起来太像真人的时候会让人有些不安。

sentences.english: In the box, she sent me another wefted human hair as a gift.
sentences.chinese: 在寄来娃娃的盒子里，她送我真人发排当礼物。

sentences.english: Awesome live version of one of Elton John's best 80's songs.
sentences.chinese: 真棒真人版埃尔顿约翰的最好的80年代的歌曲之一。

definition: Wuji county in Shijiazhuang 石家莊地區|石家庄地区[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1 di4 qu1], Hebei/The Promise (name of film by Chen Kaige)
founder (of a craft, religious sect etc)
founder or leader of a religion or sect/(fig.) revered figure
young disciple (of the same master)/younger or junior male schoolmate
honored sir (a person of higher status or seniority, or a Buddhist monk)
senior male fellow student or apprentice/son (older than oneself) of one's teacher
